channel.title: The Witch Neutral Offensive
channel.description: >**Witch Neutral Offensive (Unique).** Enemies (Passive): You'll be aganist the Blue Dragon or Unseen/Cult Magic Aura (Passive): Attacking players will be occupied when targeting you. Puppet (Day): Force a player to accuse another of treason. - 2 Uses. Misty Fog (Day): Make a player appear like a class of your choosing - 4 Uses. Dark-Ward (Night): Make a player Occupy and death immune for the night, cannot target the same player in a row. - Infinte. WhirlWind (Night): Swap the first players visitors to the second - 3 Uses. Goal: Survive and see the faction your aganist lose.

item.title: The Witch Neutral Offensive
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Neither did BD merc.
Neither does SS.

The NK could just convince the witch, if they’re heavy on BD, that they’re gonna kill an evil member to get Dark ward, then kill them.

Or they could just be, before attacking, occ immune

Pretender is generally more BD sided, but a sorc bomb or empower reap can rid of them.
Pretender King is generally more Anti-BD because they don’t want to die immediately and Anti-BD are generally more dangerous.
Sellsword by default wants the BD to lose.
Alchs are… alchs.
Mercenary is typically more harmful to evils as it wants evils to attack it’s shields and it can prevent valuable ability uses.
Scorned is a valuable asset to evils as it can lower BD members quickly if used right.
Fool is more Evil sided as it prevents the BD’s most valuable tool to kill evils: Executions

Read full topic

item.title: The Witch Neutral Offensive
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
that’s every neutral in the game nk would kill if they heavy side bd?

also this class doesn’t know it’s team mates.

Read full topic

item.title: The Witch Neutral Offensive
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Also, if you die then you have no reason not to out your teammates.

And the NK would happily kill the Witch if they heavy sided BD.

Read full topic

item.title: The Witch Neutral Offensive
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Thats more of a issue where neuts can’t be asked to fake claim or manipulate bd well.

Read full topic

item.title: The Witch Neutral Offensive
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
The entire post is just #1, and remember BD sided merc? Now they actually have a pressure to side with BD, which is “You’re not siding with us, so you’re gonna die”

Read full topic

item.description:
1, You aren’t really BD because you have to survive. (and wins with nk).
2, ??? What does that mean.

item.title: The Witch Neutral Offensive
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Soulshade55r:

Enemies (Passive): You’ll be aganist the Blue Dragon or Unseen/Cult

If you’re against the evil faction, then you might as well be Blue Dragon as

Soulshade55r:

Goal: Survive and see the faction your aganist lose.

Would suggest, because the BD would definitely kill you just to spite you because you didn’t work with them to kill the NK.

Read full topic

item.title: The Witch Neutral Offensive

item.description:
Whirlwind is offensive and it’s passive is offensive.

item.title: The Witch Neutral Offensive
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Kape:

Is this a day disguise like Scorned or night disguise?

Probably closer to frame than disguise.

Read full topic

item.title: The Witch Neutral Offensive
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
Soulshade55r:

Enemies (Passive): You’ll be aganist the Blue Dragon or Unseen/Cult

What are the odds on this?

Soulshade55r:

Misty Fog (Day): Make a player appear like a class of your choosing - 4 Uses.

Literally useless if you roll BD sided.
Is this a day disguise like Scorned or night disguise?
If it’s the second then it’s extremely powerful with 4 uses.

Soulshade55r:

WhirlWind (Night): Swap the first players visitors to the second - 3 Uses.

I don’t see how this helps achieve her win condition.

Puppet, Misty Fog are social abilities
Dark-Ward is support
Whirlwind is support/offensive

Why is this class Offensive then?

Read full topic

item.title: The Witch Neutral Offensive
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Witch Neutral Offensive (Unique).
Enemies (Passive): You’ll be aganist the Blue Dragon or Unseen/Cult
Magic Aura (Passive): Attacking players will be occupied when targeting you.
Puppet (Day): Force a player to accuse another of treason. - 2 Uses.
Misty Fog (Day): Make a player appear like a class of your choosing - 4 Uses.
Dark-Ward (Night): Make a player Occupy and death immune for the night, cannot target the same player in a row. - Infinte.
WhirlWind (Night): Swap the first players visitors to the second - 3 Uses.
Goal: Survive and see the faction your aganist lose.

Read full topic
